trans-unit.source: Specifies that the Network Client should append JDBC trace information to a trace file. The file can be specified by the traceFile=path attribute. If you do not specify a trace file but you specify the traceDirectory=path attribute, the trace information is appended to the default file. If you do not specify traceFileAppend=true, any previous version of the trace file is overwritten.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies that the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Client should append JDBC trace information to a trace file.
The file can be specified by the traceFile=path attribute.
If you do not specify a trace file but you specify the traceDirectory=path attribute, the trace information is appended to the default file.
If you do not specify traceFileAppend=true, any previous version of the trace file is overwritten.

target.mrk: Specifies that the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> Network Client should append JDBC trace information to a trace file.
The file can be specified by the traceFile=path attribute.
If you do not specify a trace file but you specify the traceDirectory=path attribute, the trace information is appended to the default file.
If you do not specify traceFileAppend=true, any previous version of the trace file is overwritten.

trans-unit.source: For more information about tracing, see "Network client tracing" in the . See traceDirectory=path and traceLevel=value for other attributes related to tracing.

seg-source.mrk: For more information about tracing, see "Network client tracing" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph>.
See traceDirectory=path and traceLevel=value for other attributes related to tracing.

target.mrk: For more information about tracing, see "Network client tracing" in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citadmin"></ph>.
See traceDirectory=path and traceLevel=value for other attributes related to tracing.

trans-unit.source: This attribute must be specified in conjunction with either the traceFile=path attribute or the traceDirectory=path attribute. You can also combine this attribute with other attributes.

seg-source.mrk: This attribute must be specified in conjunction with either the traceFile=path attribute or the traceDirectory=path attribute.
You can also combine this attribute with other attributes.

target.mrk: This attribute must be specified in conjunction with either the traceFile=path attribute or the traceDirectory=path attribute.
You can also combine this attribute with other attributes.

trans-unit.source: -- enable tracing on an existing database, appending to the -- specified file jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/mydb;traceFile=trace.out;traceFileAppend=true -- enable tracing on an existing database, appending to the default file -- within the specified directory, relative to the Derby home directory jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/mydb;traceDirectory=mytracedir;traceFileAppend=true

seg-source.mrk: -- enable tracing on an existing database, appending to the -- specified file jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/mydb;traceFile=trace.out;traceFileAppend=true -- enable tracing on an existing database, appending to the default file -- within the specified directory, relative to the Derby home directory jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/mydb;traceDirectory=mytracedir;traceFileAppend=true
